title: St Gabriel of Our Lady of Sorrows Novena

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O angelic young Gabriel, who, with your ardent love for Jesus Crucified and your compassion for Our Lady of Sorrows, were on earth a mirror of innocence and an example of every virtue; we turn to you full of confidence to implore your aid. How many evil things and afflictions, how many dangers, assail our young people from every side, seeking to make them lose the faith. By your prayers and example, St Gabriel, obtain for me and for them all the graces we need to remain faithful to God and never leave the state of sanctifying grace. O good St. Gabriel of the Sorrowful Virgin, you were taught by God to love the Passion of Jesus and to remember the Sorrows of Mary His Mother. By her side, you stood by the Cross of Jesus and shared her compassion. Following her, you grew in love for God and all His people. O St. Gabriel of the Sorrowful Virgin, we humbly ask you to intercede before God on our behalf, especially for the intentions we now present before you (mention request here‚Ä¶)

Answered Prayers From This Novena

My adult daughter has been living with me for several months.

I am 85 years old and have been unable to convince her to consider counseling for her drug addiction.

I prayed this novena to St. Gabriel of of Our Lady of Sorrows, to intervene, and through the power of God, get her into counseling.

She decided to do so and has now been in rehab for two days! Thank you St. Gabriel, Praise God!
